page.title: 10SPORTING ACTIVITIES
page.content: There are no organised men's soccer teams in Rossington but there is a Rossington Colts football team for boys and a Station Juniors team. Most schools in Rossington have a football team which competes against teams from other schools. There is a men's Rugby Union team called the Hornets and the team plays at the Rossington Miners' Welfare Ground on West End Lane. On Wednesday evenings there are cricket practices and anyone can go along, these practices are also at the Welfare Ground good players are picked for the Rossington Teams. Fishing is also a popular sport for people of all ages. Most of the pubs have darts teams for both men and women, snooker is also played at pubs and clubs in Rossington.
